name: Lancaster informal practice group
notes: Lancaster. Informal capoeira practice group started Mon Sep 12 2005. Meets once a week on Fridays. Plans workshops with visiting instructors, trips to events etc. A way for capoeiristas in the area to keep in touch and practice in the absence of an instructor. SOURCE: www.capoeira.com. We have not heard anything from them since, and we are unable to find any other capoeira in Lancaster. We have sent email 11/12/16
rawRecord:
"Mon Sep 12 2005, 08:38
This is just to let you know that I have started an informal capoeira
practice group in Lancaster [lancs. england, UK].
The group meets once a week on Fridays. We also plan workshops with
visiting instructors, trips to events etc. Its basically a way for capoeiristas
in the area to keep in touch and practice in the absence of an instructor.
If you're interested get in touch.
mat[underscore]weldon[at]yahoo[dot]co[dot]uk"
SOURCE: www.capoeira.com
(We have not heard anything from them since, and we are unable to
find any other capoeira in Lancaster. We have sent email 11/12/16)
